DOC.brief_summary: This clinical research trial evaluate efficacy deliver exercise therapy knee pain via Internet utilize algorithm design adjust home exercise program base user input . The investigator hypothesize exercise therapy deliver safely effectively increase participant satisfaction compare current standard .
DOC.brief_title: Conventional Home Exercise Programs Versus Electronic Home Exercise Versus Artificial Intelligence `` Virtual Therapy '' Anterior Knee Pain
DOC.criteria: Age 1864 anterior knee pain Have computer access Cleared exercise medical professional , possible medical professional study team phone PARQ ( Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ) Have consent participate trial Age < 18 > 64 Screened unsafe exercise medical professional , study team and/ Screened PARQ Does consent trial
